reasoning: The Economic Powerhouse plays the long game. Turn 2 is about positioning, not flashy moves. Alchemist Brynn recruitment delivers immediate 3 gold profit plus a Turn 3 gold engine. With no agent abilities available this turn, I maximized gold accumulation (+3 from actions). Territory was diversified across Market (MKT_02) and Docks (DOC_01) - a combined 7 VP in squares. Political Maneuvering card held in reserve for when courtier battles intensify. The 17 gold war chest provides unprecedented flexibility. P3 may have taken MKT_01, but they spent resources doing it. My position is sustainable; theirs requires continued aggression. Turn 3 will see Harrow place 2 free influence in Market AND Brynn generate 4 gold - that's the compound interest the Economic Powerhouse lives for. Gold flows to those who understand its power.
